|chip1 = Envara;EN202;ARM, EN202A-TBM, S60312.1 07, Zf0328 -; |chip2 = Envara;EN313;EN313B2, ICK 2603; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "AWU-901W" and "CPCM0P9237-SB" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The FCC test report indicates that this hardware was used for the following... *PTI PTI-610G *Alloy WLU2454
==Links of Interest== *[http://download.modem-help.co.uk/mfcs-A/Amigo/AWU-901W/Drivers/Windows-2k/901-final-driver.zip.php Driver on m-h]
